title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 150.7 - Copies and certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 150.7 - Copies and certificates

State Regulations
A request for a copy of a record or a request for a
certificate shall be in writing. The request shall specify, by name of
organization and document, the record to be copied or the certificate
desired. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
150.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
